briefdescription.para: PDO Function code.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string name_, T val, uint16_t index_, uint8_t subindex_, param_cb_t cb=nullptr)
memberdef.name: Parameter

briefdescription.para: Parameter Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the parameter.
Value to store in the parameter (the type will be used to fixed the data size)
Index of the object in the object dictionary of the device.
Subindex of the object in the object dictionary of the device.
[facultative] The address of a callback function that will be called each time the parameter is updated by the device.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string name_, T val, uint32_t index__sub, param_cb_t cb=nullptr)
memberdef.name: Parameter

briefdescription.para: Parameter Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the parameter.
Value to store in the parameter (the type will be used to fixed the data size)
Index and subindex of the object in the object dictionary of the device. (in the format index__sub)
[facultative] The address of a callback function that will be called each time the parameter is updated by the device.

briefdescription.para: link_to_pdo Links a paramet to a PDO message

parameterdescription.para: The function code of the PDO
The index of the parameter data inside the PDO Message Payload

briefdescription.para: sets Set the value of a parameter.

parameterdescription.para: The value to set. (the type has to be coherent with the parameter data size)
If set the value of the Parameter is set even idf the previous value has not been sent yet to the remote device.
Has to be set to True if the data being set come from the remote device (so the sending flag will not be raised)

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New int8_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New int16_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New int32_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New uint8_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New uint16_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the parameter.

parameterdescription.para: New uint32_t value to set

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: gets Returns the value (with a type T coherent with the data size)
operator int8_t Returns the value as an int8_t
operator int16_t Returns the value as an int16_t
operator int32_t Returns the value as an int32_t
operator uint8_t Returns the value as an uint8_t
operator uint16_t Returns the value as an uint16_t
operator uint32_t Returns the value as an uint32_t
from_payload Sets the value of the parameters with the data of a payload.

parameterdescription.para: Payload to store in the parameter
Index in the payload array where the parameter data is
If set the data is processed as a receied data (no sending flag raised)

simplesect.para: True if the parameter value has been changed.

briefdescription.para: has_been_sent Returns the sending flag.
callback Execute the parameter callback (If not null)
payload Returns a payload filled with the parameter data.

parameterdescription.para: If a boolean pointer is passed the sending flag is stored in the booled and then cleared.

simplesect.para: A payload filled with the parameter data.

briefdescription.para: Object from the object dictionary of a remote CANopen device.
